text:
e="preserve">Andrea Gill is a politician and biologist from Belize.
Gill was President of the Senate of Belize from 2008-2012. Between 2008 and 2009, she served as president of the Forum of Presiding Officers of National Parliaments of Central America and the Caribbean (FOPREL).
Between 1997 and 2001, Gill was part of a manatee research project.
